DOC.brief_title: IgA Nephropathy Registration Initiative High Quality ( INSIGHT )
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator register biopsy-proven primary IgA nephropathy ( IgAN ) patient , develop IgAN database China . Patients ' demographic characteristic ( include age , gender , height , weight , BMI , smoking , drinking , education ) , clinical characteristic ( include systolic blood pressure , diastolic blood pressure , primary cause ESRD , lab measurement serum urine ) , complication , drug information baseline collect . Patients follow-up every one year , demographic clinical characteristic , complication drug information patient collect visit . The investigator also record clinical event visit , mortality ( include all-cause mortality cardiovascular disease mortality ) , ESRD ( define initiation dialysis kidney transplantation ) hospitalization cause . All-cause cardiovascular mortality composite renal outcome double serum creatinine ESRD IgAN patient compare use IgAN database .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Biopsyproven primary IgAN patient ; 2. age ≥14 year old 3 . Adequate biopsy sample contain ≥8 glomerulus . Secondary cause mesangial IgA deposition , HenochSchonlein purpura nephritis , systemic lupus erythematosus , liver cirrhosis et al ; eGFR≤15ml/min/1.73m2 biopsy .
